chainName: Build Full Station Page with OPUX
description: Create comprehensive station page showing all stats, status, heats, judges, and real-time information

steps.name: Design Station Page Structure
steps.description: Plan the full station page layout with sections for: stats dashboard, current heat, queue, history, judges, station lead
steps.expected: Component structure with all required sections

steps.name: Create Station Statistics Dashboard
steps.description: Build statistics dashboard showing: total heats, completed heats, completion rate, average heat time, current round progress

steps.name: Add Current Heat Display
steps.description: Show current active heat with segments, timer, competitors, judges, and status
steps.expected: Current heat card with all details

steps.name: Add Upcoming Heats Queue
steps.description: Display queue of upcoming heats with estimated start times, competitors, and round info

steps.name: Add Completed Heats History
steps.description: Show history of completed heats with winners, scores, and completion times

steps.name: Add Judge Assignments Section
steps.description: Display all judges assigned to this station's heats with roles and status

steps.name: Add Station Lead Information
steps.description: Show station lead name, contact, and availability

steps.name: OPUX Step 1: Lighthouse Audit
steps.description: Run mobile Lighthouse audit to identify performance, accessibility, and layout issues

steps.name: OPUX Step 2: Responsive Refactor
steps.description: Fix layout issues, add mobile breakpoints, improve CLS, fix overflow

steps.name: OPUX Step 3: Tailwind Optimizer
steps.description: Normalize Tailwind classes, enforce design system, reduce duplication
